评论详情: Very pretty dress. Definitely need a petticoat under if you want the fullness. I did return it ultimately just because it runs too small.
I got this so that I could wear polka dots to a buddy guy concert. It turned out to be a nice cute dress!  Runs about true to size.

I love the dress but it was not made for long girls in mind. The sleeves are too short to be a long sleeve and too long for 3/4 so it looks like a 5/6th sleeve. I just tug it up but still something to be aware of.
This dress is exactly as shown.  Fits well, and well made.  Is heavy fabric, so not for hot weather.  Very pretty!
I got this as an option for a 50’s party and although i didn't wear it i liked it enough to keep it because its fun.

Roomier fit than I was expecting in top. While the top in heavier and stretchy, the skirt is completely transparent and tissue thin so will need a multilayer pettiskirt. Bought for my 13 year old, 5 foot even girl and she loves it, especially with a poofy underskirt. It's past knee length even with an added underskirt so it fits the dress code for the event we purchased it for. Good for the price though. Not itchy or poorly sewn. Definitely going to delicate wash because the top and bottom are not even close to similar weight or material. Not something she can wear anywhere but to a special event.
Fits good, love style good fabric, comfortable
I purchased the music note dress for my Granddaughter to wear to her school holiday concert. The size small fit her and has room to grow as well. Well made for the occasion.
This dress was very impressive on stage in a "Piano" number! Received lots of compliments on it! Dresses are 'stretchy' so was able to fit dancers into smaller sizes than listed.

评论概述: A little thin, but good for a costume.
评论详情: I got this for a Halloween costume and honestly the only complaint I had was it was a little thin.  However, it was under $30 so that comes with the territory.  I am 5'2" tall and weigh 175 and the size chart was dead on for what size was needed.  I normally wear a size 16 and this had me get a 3xl.  I did think it would have a longer torso, but again it is under $30 so I am not complaining.  All in all great for what you pay.
